answers.answer: Hi, I'm not a medical professional, just the parent of a kid with type 1 diabetes.  As far as I know, genital herpes won't affect a diabetic any differently than anyone else, but that is a discussion that you likely should have with your doctor.

question: How can genital herpies effect a man with diabetes 2 ?
title: How can genital herpies effect a man with diabetes 2
